document.docAuthor: Bolger, Thomas, Arroyo, Julio & Piotrowska, Katarzyna
document.masterDocTitle: A catalogue of the species of Mesostigmata (Arachnida, Acari, Parasitiformes) recorded from Ireland including information on their geographical distribution and habitats

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A catalogue of the species of Mesostigmata (Arachnida, Acari, Parasitiformes) recorded from Ireland including information on their geographical distribution and habitats

subSubSection.paragraph: Eulaelaps Berlese, 1903

• Original name :
Gamasus stabularis Koch, 1836
.
• In : Deutschlands Crustaceen , Myriopoden und Arachniden . 1835–1844 . Regensburg, fasc.27 (1).

• Combinations/variations used in Irish literature:
Eulaelaps pachypus Hermann
( Fairley, 1963 , 1964a , b ,
Counties: Antrim, Cavan, Clare, Cork, Derry, Down, Kerry, Kildare, Limerick, Louth, Mayo, Meath, Offaly , Tyrone, Wicklow .

Haemogamasus Berlese, 1910
•
Haemogamasus arvicolarum Berlese, 1920
• Original name :
Haemogamasus horridus var. arvicolarum Berlese, 1920
. • In :
Redia
, 14: 166. • Combinations/variations used in Irish literature:
Euhaemogamasus arvicolarum Berlese
(
Turk & Turk , 1952
).

Irish Records : On
Apodemus sylvaticus
(
Turk , 1945
;
Turk & Turk , 1952
); on
Clethrionomys glareolus
Counties: Cork, Dublin .

• Original name :
Haemogamasus hirsutus Berlese, 1889
.

• In :
Acari
,
Myriapoda and Scorpiones hucusque in Italia reperta
, 52 (2).

Irish Records : On
Apodemus sylvaticus ( Fairley, 1965 )
; on
Clethrionomys glareolus ( Fairley, 1970 )
; small mammal nests (unpublished data).
Counties: Cork, Kilkenny .

• Original name :
Haemogamasus nidi Michael, 1892
• In : Transactions of the . Linnean Society ., London , Zoology , 5: 314.

Irish Records : On
Apodemus sylvatica
( Fairley, 1963 , 1964a , b , 1965 , 1972); on
Mustela erminea ( Fairley, 1965 )
; on
Clethrionomys glareolus
( Fairley, 1970; unpublished data ); small mammal nests (unpublished data).
Counties: Antrim, Cork, Derry, Down, Kerry, Offaly , Tyrone.

• Original name :
Laelaps ( Eulaelaps ) pontiger Berlese, 1904
.

• In :
Redia
1: 260.

• Combinations/variations used in Irish literature:
Laelaps ( Hypoaspis ) longipes Halbert (Halbert, 1915
; Hull, 1918 ; Luxton, 1998 ),
Haemogamasus oudemansi Hirst ( O’Farrell & Butler, 1948 )
. Irish Records : No habitat details ( Halbert, 1915 ); farm and commercial grainstores, flour mills and rainway wagons which had contained grain ( O’Farrell & Butler, 1948 ; Cusack, 1974 ;
Cusack et al ., 1975
; Cusack & Brennan, 1976 ); weeds in barley field ( Emmanuel, 1977 ). Counties: Antrim , Derry , Donegal , Kildare , Mayo .
